title: looking for N172 Old Judge - Art Whitney with Dog
author: Archive

posts.post_title: looking for N172 Old Judge - Art Whitney with Dog
posts.post_content:
Posted By: bbigelow
...I'm looking for an example of the "Whitney with Dog" Old Judge card to go into a canine-themed collection...ideal condition/grade would be a PSA or SGC A, 1, 2 or maybe 3, with dog and player nicely visible in image (periphery and back not so important)...

incidentally, always buying 19th Century dog-picture cards like N47 (Allen & Ginter), N163 (Goodwin) and N375 (Ellis brands), as well as many 20th Century dog cards... 



I can be contacted at 



bbigelow@mastroauctions.com



thanks very much...

Brian Bigelow

That's a very cool collecting theme and one I've often thought about pursuing.

Rob

it's a fun pursuit...my specialty is Saint Bernards...I'm glad Whitney isn't pictured with one of those [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

thanks for reading...Brian
